content: this legal text provides a summary of a legal case involving a dispute over 45140 euros the parties involved are not mentioned but it explains that there was a mediation agreement between two parties referred to as cm and two brothers the agreement involved the division of an inheritance with the sister transferring her rights to a property to the brother for a value of 17000 euros the mediation process took place on march 18 2014 and the parties involved reached an agreement regarding the division of a real estate unit the agreement was certified as enforceable by the lawyers present and the mediation proceedings were closed the total mediation costs amounted to 45140 euros

metadata.cost: 451,40 EUR of legal cost and 17'000.00 of compensation cost
